mapper.insert: insert into QUIZBANK_CHOICE (ID, TYPE, QUESTION, A, B, C, D, ANSWER, EXTRA1, EXTRA2, EXTRA3) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{b,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{d,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{extra1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update QUIZBANK_CHOICE set TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QUESTION = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A = #{a,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, B = #{b,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C = #{c,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, D = #{d,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANSWER = #{answer,jdbcType=CHAR}, EXTRA1 = #{extra1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTRA2 = #{extra2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTRA3 = #{extra3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, TYPE, QUESTION, A, B, C, D, ANSWER, EXTRA1, EXTRA2, EXTRA3 from QUIZBANK_CHOICE
